title: Some thoughts on the bill depending before the right honourable the House of Lords for prohibiting the exportation of the woolen manufactures of Ireland to foreign parts, humbly offer'd to their lordships.
author: Cox, Richard, Sir, 1650-1733.
notes: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
Attributed to Ricard Cox. cf. Wing.
